text: Ede Vadászi (September 13, 1923 in Budapest – June 12, 1995 in Budapest), aka Ede Viboch, was a Hungarian basketball player who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was a member of the Hungarian team, which finished sixteenth in the 1948 tournament. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Hungarian men's basketball players Category:Olympic basketball players of Hungary Category:Basketball players at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Ede Vadászi
